DefaultChampionshipsWon.description: Number of not repeated default championship the player won

StockChampionshipsWon.description: Number of stock car and opala championship the player won

PolesF1Series.description: Number of pole positions won with F1 series

WonRacesF1Series.description: Number of won races with F1 series

MultiplayerFinishedRaces.description: Number of multiplayer races the player has finished

TTRankedTracks.description: Number of official and not repeated tracks for which the player set a time

DefaultChampionshipsWonMask.description: Each bit identifies a single default championship

TTRankedTracksMask1.description: Each bit identifies a single layout

TTRankedTracksMask2.description: Each bit identifies a single layout

CarsDriven.description: Number of driven cars with no repetition

CarsDrivenMask1.description: Each bit identifies a single car
